name: Spooky Survival
description:
Controls

WASD = Move
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON = Fire
SCROLL = Switch weapon

1.2 patch:

addition
  • added Slimes (Large, Medium, Small)

changes

  • slimes adjust in speed varying on their size, the smaller the faster.
  • buffed the skeleton with more health and speed.
  • the health packs don't glitch no more.
  • you no longer glitch out of the map

1.1 patchadditions
  • added a kill counter
changes
  • scroll to switch weapon
  • the camera moves with your cursor
  • more mobs spawn, and spawn faster over time.
  • also building the game for mac and linux if that's what you're into.
  • most things actually make sound now.
